data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 1,538,056 believers in Wisconsin, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Wisconsin, United States
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 1,538,056 believers in the state of Wisconsin.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Wisconsin, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Wisconsin that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Mandingo, Mandinka people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Mandingo, Mandinka people.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Wisconsin, United States.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 1,538,056 believers in Wisconsin to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Spirit, encourage the church of Wisconsin, United States that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ
